TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Page extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Page Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IAddChild
public ref class Page : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 封装一页可由 Windows Internet Explorer、 和 导航到和承载的内容。

span.span: Encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated to and hosted by Windows Internet Explorer, , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封装一页的内容可以进行导航，并具有以下键成员： encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated, and has the following key members: - **生存期管理**: 。**Lifetime Management**: . - **导航**: 。**Navigation**: . - **外观**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Appearance**: , , , , , , , . - **承载窗口外观**: ， ， 。**Host Window Appearance**: , , . 可以通过使用标记、 标记和代码隐藏或代码定义一个页面。A page can be defined by using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 页的导航窗格中，包内容的首选的方法是出于以下原因：A page is the preferred way to package content for navigation, for the following reasons: - 很容易定义、 重用和管理。It is easy to define, reuse, and manage. - 它可以访问并使用导航到它。It can access and use the that navigated to it. - 它可以更改标题、 宽度、 高度和导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]及其主机窗口的 (， ， ， )。It can alter the title, width, height, and navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of its host window (, , , ). - 它具有设计器支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]。It has designer support in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]. 可以从托管页， ， ，或从浏览器。A page can be hosted from , , , or from a browser. 要进行承载，网页可：To be hosted, a page can be: - 直接子级， ，或中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The direct child of a , , or element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. - 实例化并将设置的值为`Content`属性， ，和。Instantiated and set as the value of the `Content` property of , , and . - 将设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]源`Source`任一属性或。Set as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] source of the `Source` property of either or . - 将设置为独立应用程序中。Set as the in a standalone application. - 将设置为中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Set as the in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 应用程序通常具有两个或多个页，可以使用以下机制之间导航：An application typically has two or more pages, which can be navigated between using the following mechanisms: - 以声明方式使用。Declaratively by using . - 以编程方式通过使用。Programmatically by using . - 以可视方式使用导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的主机，包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]， ，和。Visually by using the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host, including [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], , and . 使用页函数的结构化导航 ()，请参阅[结构化导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md)和[导航拓扑概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md)。For structured navigation using page functions (), see [Structured Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md) and [Navigation Topologies Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何标准页是使用仅标记来定义：The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupPage.xaml#markuppagemarkup)] 下面的示例演示如何使用定义的标准页面只代码：The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/CodePage.cs#codepagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/codepage.vb#codepagecodebehind)] 下面的示例演示一个标准的页是如何使用标记和代码隐藏的组合来定义。The following example shows how a standard page is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml#markupandcodebehindpagemarkup)] [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml.cs#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/markupandcodebehindpage.xaml.vb#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不正在保持活动状态 (请参阅)，它需要实现一个默认构造函数，以便允许[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]创建后退导航到它时的新实例或前进导航历史记录。If a is not being kept alive (see ), it needs to implement a default constructor to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to create a new instance of it when navigated to in back or forward navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在导航历史记录中保留 实例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance is retained in navigation history.

value.span: 如果在导航历史记录中保留 实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is retained in navigation history; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当第一次一个页导航到的新实例创建类。When a page is first navigated to, a new instance of the class is created. 当页面离开 （返回或转发） 时，页的条目添加到导航历史记录。When a page is navigated away from (either back or forward), an entry for the page is added to navigation history. 默认情况下，该条目不引用的页对象。By default, the entry does not reference the page object. 相反，该条目包含页上的包统一资源标识符 (URI)。Instead, the entry contains a pack uniform resource identifier (URI) for the page. 导航到使用导航历史记录页的对应项后，包 URI 用于创建页面的新实例。When the entry for the page is navigated to using navigation history, the pack URI is used to create a new instance of the page. 此行为是默认设置，以避免过多的内存使用： 保留页实例会迅速消耗内存，尤其是那些具有重要的内容量。This behavior is the default, to avoid excessive memory use: retaining page instances can quickly consume memory, particularly those with a nontrivial amount of content. 此问题是利用手段来强化是可以存储在后面的入口数和前进导航历史记录堆栈没有限制。This problem is augmented by the fact that there is no limit to the number of entries that can be stored in the back and forward stacks of navigation history. 与此相反，将存储为页的包 Uri 中有内存消耗几乎没有影响。In contrast, storing pack URIs for pages has virtually no impact on memory consumption. 创建的新实例的主要副作用是页面的页面状态不页面的到另一个记住从页面的一个实例。The main side effect of creating new instances of a page is that page state is not remembered from one instance of a page to another. 在这些情况下，Windows Presentation Foundation 提供了一些用于记忆状态的几个方法。In these cases, Windows Presentation Foundation offers several techniques for remembering state. 若要使页面处于活动状态，请设置属性`true`(默认值是`false`)。To keep a page alive, you set the property to `true` (the default is `false`). > [!NOTE] > 页来实例化并导航到仅使用代码 (例如，调用)，将自动保持活动状态。Pages that are instantiated and navigated to using only code (for example, calling ), are automatically kept alive. 应避免设置到`true`除非你需要：You should avoid setting to `true` unless you need to: - 当页具有大量的内容时，它可能需要很长时间才能实例化。When a page has a lot of content, it may take a long time to instantiate. 如果页面不保持活动状态，并且页面频繁导航到，则不断实例化该页的成本可能对用户体验产生负面影响。If the page is not kept alive, and the page is frequently navigated to, the cost of constantly instantiating the page may have a negative impact on the user experience. 但是，从性能角度看，你应依赖于默认设置，并分析你的应用程序的性能;如果测试标识了低于所需的应用程序范围的加载时间的页，配置应保持活动状态的页可能会解决问题的一种方法。However, from a performance perspective, you should rely on the default settings and profile your application's performance; if testing identifies pages with load times that fall below the range required for your application, configuring the pages to be kept alive may be one way to solve the problem. > [!NOTE] > 将保持活动状态的页的条目不会保留的导航历史记录中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]如果某个用户导航离开并返回到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Entries for pages that are kept alive are not retained in navigation history of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] if a user navigates away from and back to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 只有不将保持活动状态的页的日记条目保留在导航历史记录。Only journal entries for pages that are not kept alive are retained in navigation history. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖属性上的元数据类型是，而不。The metadata type on this dependency property is , not . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]要保留的实例跨多个导航的类。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to retain an instance of the class across multiple navigations. [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang2)] [!code-csharp[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NavigationService As NavigationService

summary.span: 获取页的宿主用来管理导航的导航服务。

span.span: Gets the navigation service that the host of the page is using to manage navigation.

value.span: 页的宿主用来管理导航的 对象；或者，如果宿主不支持导航，则为 。

span.span: The object that the host of the page is using to manage navigation, or if the host does not support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面可以承载多个主机，包括类型， ， ，和浏览器。Pages can be hosted by multiple types of hosts, including , , , and a browser. 页通常需要将其主机的导航，以提供在页面导航支持与集成。Pages often need to integrate with their host's navigation to provide in-page navigation support. 但是，由于页可能不知道在运行时，其主机将是什么，它无法直接将与集成其主机导航成员，若要这样做。However, because a page may not know what its host will be at run time, it cannot integrate directly with its host's navigation members to do so. 相反，它可以尝试使用一个导航服务，它是一个服务，支持浏览器样式的导航和包装类。Instead, it can attempt to use a navigation service, which is a service that supports browser-style navigation and is encapsulated by the class. 无法创建你自己实例，但。You cannot create your own instance, though. 相反，主机类型如， ，或浏览器创建其自己实例可以访问从该实例属性。Instead, host types such as , , or a browser create their own instance that you can access from the property. 从返回的导航服务属性是实例由可视树上的第一个导航器的类。The navigation service that is returned from the property is the instance of the class that is managed by the first navigator up the visual tree. 如果未找到其中一个，`null`返回，，该值指示页面的主机不支持导航。If one is not found, `null` is returned, indicating a page's host does not support navigation. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持导航和不提供导航服务。The class does not support navigation and does not provide a navigation service. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何页可检查导航服务是否可用并且，如果是这样，使用它来向后定位到前一页。The following example shows how a page can check if a navigation service is available and, if so, use it to navigate back to the previous page. [!code-csharp[PageNavigationServiceSnippets#GetPageNavigationServiceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#getpagenavigationservicecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageNavigationServiceSnippets#GetPageNavigationServiceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#getpagenavigationservicecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsNavigationUI { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] 上的 的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] is visible.

value.span: 如果宿主 的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a host is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]默认情况下启用浏览器样式向前和向后导航。 displays navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] by default to enable browser-style forwards and backwards navigation. 如果页面设置为，将自动打开以承载该页面中的。If a page is set as the , automatically opens a to host the page in. 如果页面不希望使用默认导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，它可以设置到`false`。If the page does not want to use the default navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], it can set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 因为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]未集成与导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)]，它提供了自己的导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，它们可以显示或隐藏通过设置。Because [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] does not integrate with the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)], it provides its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], which can be shown or hidden by setting . [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 与未集成[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，因此设置中的网页上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]不起作用。 does integrate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], so setting on pages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] has no effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]若要隐藏导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to hide the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a . [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang2)] [!code-csharp[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)]

exception.span: 在并非由 、 或浏览器承载的 实例上，将检查 属性。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .
The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性未显示通过，也不显示从承载窗口的标题栏。The value of the property is not displayed by , nor is it displayed from the title bar of the window that is hosting a . 相反，应该设置更改主机窗口的标题。Instead, you set to change the title of a host window. 此外可以用于生成一种导航内容的导航历史记录条目的名称。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 数据的以下部分用于自动构造的导航历史记录条目名称，按优先级顺序：The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加属性。The attached attribute. - 属性。The property. - 属性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]针对当前页The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果关联对象具有一种导航历史记录中的内容，你可以指定显示的名称中的导航历史记录条目通过重写。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name that appears in the navigation history entry by overriding . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double WindowHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的高度。

span.span: The height of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当应用直接由一个窗口，其中包括： is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由承载，则设置不起作用，但您仍可以获取的值。If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . A中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]可以仅使用若要更改的高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; 高度不能更改通过设置， ，或。A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the height of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the height cannot be changed by setting , , or . 最小高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口是 150 像素。The minimum height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 150 pixels. 对于浏览器承载的页，这意味着的值如果它将导致的总高度不能应用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口为少于 150 个像素。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 150 pixels. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从页中设置窗口的高度。The following example shows how to set the height of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowHeightPage.xaml#setpagewindowheightxaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WindowTitle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的标题。

span.span: The title of a window that directly hosts the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，承载页时，窗口的标题包括和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]，是当前正在承载文件的名称 (带有.xaml 扩展名如果该页是松散[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或如果页属于.xbap扩展名[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).By default, the title of a window that hosts a page, including and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], is the name of the file that is currently being hosted (with an .xaml extension if the page is loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or an .xbap extension if the page is part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]). 页面可以更改默认值，通过设置其属性。A page can change the default by setting its property. 一旦页按这种方式设置窗口的标题，窗口的标题不会更改直到另一个页设置具有不同的值。Once a page sets the title of a window in this way, the window's title does not change until another page sets with a different value. > [!NOTE] > 必须为最顶层的一段中的窗口的内容产生任何影响中; 如果承载在，例如，设置不会更改主机窗口的标题。The must be the topmost piece of content in a window for to have an effect; if a is hosted within a , for example, setting does not change the title of the host window. 此外可以用于生成一种导航内容的导航历史记录条目的名称。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 数据的以下部分用于自动构造的导航历史记录条目名称，按优先级顺序：The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加属性。The attached attribute. - 属性。The property. - 属性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]针对当前页The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果关联对象具有一种导航历史记录中的内容，你可以通过重写中指定导航历史记录元素的名称值。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name value of a navigation history element by overriding . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置从页窗口的标题。The following example shows how to set the title of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowTitleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowTitlePage.xaml#setpagewindowtitlexaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double WindowWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的宽度。

span.span: The width of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当应用直接由一个窗口，其中包括： is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由承载，则设置不起作用，但您仍可以获取的值。If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . A中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]可以仅使用若要更改的宽度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; 宽度不能更改通过设置， ，或。A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the width of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the width cannot be changed by setting , , or . 最小宽度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口为 250 像素。The minimum width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 250 pixels. 对于浏览器承载的页，这意味着的值如果它将导致的总宽度可能不会应用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口要小于 250 像素。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 250 pixels. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从页中设置窗口的宽度。The following example shows how to set the width of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowWidthXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowWidthPage.xaml#setpagewindowwidthxaml)]
